comment: I put amazing lectures because she used Tyra Burton's lectures and you will get so much out of them! Prof. Mount is a tough grader (and gives no details) and this class had 2 field experience reports (event and interview) that accounted for most of your grade. TONS OF WORK DUE! I would NOT take her again, take Tyra Burton if you get the option!

Beware! Do not take her! She grades so harshly with absolutely no feedback. All tests and quizzes are open answer, and she will give you a C on every test and quiz. Grades discussions and papers extremely harsh as well. She didn't put any grades in until the last week of class, and didn't answer any emails throughout the semester.
